S08n725:3: atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatavajradhāraṇīsamayasaṃbhavādhiṣṭhānannāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajrasāvitre svāhā ||
S08n725:4: atha vajrāpāṇirmahābodhisatvaḥ punarapīmaṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajradhāri hūṃ ||
S08n725:6: atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsatva imāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajraratnagotre svāhā ||
S08n725:7: atha vajranetro bodhisatvo mahāsatva imāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajrapadmanetre hūṃ phaṭ ||
S08n725:8: atha vajraviśvo bodhisatvo mahāsatva imāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajrakarmakari hūṃ ||
S08n725:9: atha vajravidyottamo bodhisattva imāṃ svavidyottamāmabhāṣat oṃ vajraśūlāgre svāhā ||
S08n725:10: atha vajramāyo vidyārāja imāṃ svamudrāmabhāṣat oṃ vajracakre hūṃ ||
S08n725:15: atha vajrakuṇḍalirvajrakrodha imāṃ samayamudrāmabhāṣat oṃ jvālāvajre hūṃ ||
S08n725:16: atha vajraprabha uvāca oṃ vajrasaumye hūṃ ||
S08n725:20: atha vajraśauṇḍaḥ svasamayamudrāmabhāṣat oṃ vajrameda hūṃ ||
S08n725:25: atha vajramusalaḥ svasamayamudrāmudājahāra oṃ vajramusala-grahe hūṃ ||
S08n725:45: bhīmāṃ śriyaṃ sarasvatīṃ durgāṃ koṇeṣu vāmataḥ |
S08n725:46: bāhyakoṇeṣu mudrā vai āsāmeva tu saṃlikhet ||5 ||
S08n725:50: athatra vajramaṇḍale yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā vajrāṅku śādibhiḥ samayakarma kṛtvā,
S08n725:52: brūyān “na kasyacittvayā adṛṣṭasamayastaitāḥ samayamudrāḥ purato vaktavyāḥ,
S08n725:57: yatra patati sāsya samayamudrā vaśya bhavati ā ||
S08n725:64: tatrāsyā hṛdayaṃ bhavati oṃ sarvavajragāmini sarvabhakṣe sādhaya guhyavajriṇi hūṃ phaṭ ||
S08n725:69: sarvamudrāmanasottamānyapi sarvakarmāṇi kurvantī” tyāha bhagavān vajradharaḥ ||
S08n725:73: mukhorṇā ca mukhoddhāntā mūrdhni sthāpya dvidhikṛte ||ti ||1 ||
S08n725:75: anayā bandhayā samyak sidhyed vidyottamaḥ svayam ||2 ||
S08n725:78: cakrā sarvāṅgasaṃpīḍā ghaṇṭā mudrā tathaiva ca |
S08n725:81: jvālā parigrahā caiva prabhā saṃgrahameva ca |
S08n725:84: pānamudrā ca mālā ca vajrā ca ṣṭaṃbhanāmitā |
